115573.content:
Je netko odradio onaj zadnji dio sa docker-composeom? Imamo problema sa skriptom wait-for-it -> ≈æelimo prvo pokrenuti konfiguracijski i registracijski server, pa tek onda ova 3 mikroservisa i to nam ne uspijeva, odnosno ne mo≈æemo implementirati to ƒçekanje (imamo _racing condition_).

Ovo nam je docker-compose.yml:

```yml
version: '3.7'
services:
  config:
    image: config-server-jib
    ports:
      - "8888:8888"
  eureka:
    image: eureka-server-jib
    ports:
      - "8761:8761"
    depends_on:
      - "config"
    command: ["/wait-for-it.sh", "config:8888", "--strict"]
  humidity:
    image: humidity-jib
    ports:
      - "8082:8082"
    depends_on:
      - "eureka"
    command: ["/wait-for-it.sh", "eureka:8761", "--strict"]
  temperature:
    image: temperature-jib
    ports:
      - "8083:8083"
    depends_on:
      - "eureka"
    command: ["/wait-for-it.sh", "eureka:8761", "--strict"]
  aggregator:
    image: aggregator-jib
    ports:
      - "8081:8081"
    depends_on:
      - "eureka"
    command: [ "/wait-for-it.sh", "eureka:8761", "--strict"]
    ```

A ovo nam je JIB plugin u build.gradle-u:

```
jib {
	from {
		image = 'openjdk:11.0.9-jre-slim'
	}

	to {
		image = 'humidity-jib'
	}

	container {
		appRoot = '/opt'
		ports = ['8082']
		jvmFlags = ['-Djava.security.edg=file:/dev/./urandom']
	}

	extraDirectories.paths = ['src/main/jib']
}
```

Skripta wait-for-it se nalazi u svakom projektu unutar foldera src/main/jib. Takoƒëer, pokrenuli smo ruƒçno jedan od mikroservisa i vidjeli smo da se u root-u kontejnera nalazi ta skripta.  Je li itko uspje≈°no odradio pokretanje tih aplikacija u pravilnom redoslijedu? Nama se nekad uspije pokrenuti sve po pravilnom redoslijedu, ali u 99% sluƒçajeva puca. Vidi li tko ≈°to nam je krivo?

117980.content: @Kiflica#117818 edit ovo je rijeseno. Kad implementiramo eureka server i klijent i dobijemo na localhost:8761/ da nam je aggregator registriran i sad na koju foru treba napravit ovaj dio da se preko eureka servera po imenu pristupa uslugama temperature-ms i humidity-ms?

118063.content: @Kiflica#117980 Treba≈° registrirat i temp i humidity mikrousluge s tim imenima. Onda pogledaj razred DiscoveryClient. Moras ga autowireat u kontroler od aggregatora. Onda imas metodu getInstances(serviceId), gdje je serviceId humidity-ms, odnosno temperature-ms. Ona ti po serviceId-u vrati instancu koja je registrirana na Eureka serveru. Od dobivene instance onda samo uzmes host i port i stavis u restTemplate.getForObject(url, returnType) sto ti vrati mjerenje vlage ili temperature. I to je to.

118073.content:
@RS7#115573 

Nama radi docker. Ovo je docker-compose.yml:
```yml
version: "3.7"
services:
    config-server-microservice:
        image: config-server-microservice-jib:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
        ports:
            - "8888:8888"

    eureka-server:
        image: eureka-server-jib:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
        ports:
            - "8761:8761"
        environment:
            EUREKA_INSTANCE_HOSTNAME: eureka-server

    humidity-microservice:
        image: humidity-microservice-jib:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
        ports:
            - "8080:8080"
        depends_on:
            - config-server-microservice
            - eureka-server
        entrypoint:
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - config-server-microservice:8888
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - eureka-server:8761
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - java
            - -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom
            - -cp
            - /app/resources:/app/classes:/app/libs/*
            - hr.fer.rassus.labpro.grupa23.humidityMicroservice.HumidityMicroserviceApplication
        environment:
            EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE: http://eureka-server:8761/eureka/
            SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_URI: http://config-server-microservice:8888

    temperature-microservice:
        image: temperature-microservice-jib:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
        ports:
            - "8081:8081"
        depends_on:
            - config-server-microservice
            - eureka-server
        entrypoint:
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - config-server-microservice:8888
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - eureka-server:8761
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - java
            - -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom
            - -cp
            - /app/resources:/app/classes:/app/libs/*
            - hr.fer.rassus.labpro.grupa23.temperatureMicroservice.TemperatureMicroserviceApplication
        environment:
            EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE: http://eureka-server:8761/eureka/
            SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_URI: http://config-server-microservice:8888

    aggregator-microservice:
        image: aggregator-microservice-jib:0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
        ports:
            - "8082:8082"
        depends_on:
            - config-server-microservice
            - eureka-server
            - humidity-microservice
            - temperature-microservice
        entrypoint:
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - config-server-microservice:8888
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - eureka-server:8761
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - humidity-microservice:8080
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - /wait-for-it.sh
            - temperature-microservice:8081
            - --timeout=60
            - --strict
            - --
            - java
            - -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom
            - -cp
            - /app/resources:/app/classes:/app/libs/*
            - hr.fer.rassus.labpro.grupa23.aggregatorMicroservice.AggregatorMicroserviceApplication
        environment:
            EUREKA_CLIENT_SERVICEURL_DEFAULTZONE: http://eureka-server:8761/eureka/
            SPRING_CLOUD_CONFIG_URI: http://config-server-microservice:8888
```
Wait skripte se mogu chainati.

JIB u build.gradle-u aggregatora, humidity-ms-a i temperature-ms-a (znaci onih koji su ovisni o drugima):

```gradle
jib {
	from {
    	image = 'openjdk:11.0.5-jre-slim'
 	}
  
	to {
  		image = "${project.name}-jib:${version}"
  	}
  
	container {
  		appRoot = '/app'
  		ports = ['8082']
  		jvmFlags = ['-Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom']
  		extraDirectories {
		    permissions = [
		        '/wait-for-it.sh': '755'
		    ]
  		}
  		
  		creationTime = "USE_CURRENT_TIMESTAMP"
  	}  
}
```

Config server i eureka imaju isti jib, jedino nemaju extraDirectories {}, a nemaju ni skriptu, jer oni ne ovise o nikome.

Skripta nam je kod ostalih u 'src/main/jib' pa prema dokumentaciji ne treba dodavati extraDirectories.paths, jer se taj folder gleda kao root. Bitno je i da skripta kao end of line ima LF, a ne CRLF. To se moze u vscode-u promijenit. A za git treba dodat i .gitattributes da ne promijeni automatski iz LF u CRLF kod commita.

Ovaj extraDirectories.permissions omogucuje izvrsavanje skripte.

Nadam se da ce ovo bit nekom od pomoci.

119890.content:
@hobbit#119883 temperature-ms nije host name, Eureka generira neki svoj. Moras preko DiscoveryClienta dobit instancu od temperature-ms i onda preko metoda getHost() i getPort() dobijes url na koji saljes zahtjev za mjerenje.

Ovdje pod "Talking to the registry" imas objasnjeno to: [https://spring.io/guides/gs/service-registration-and-discovery/](url)
